bill_title: require certain municipalities to license residential contractors.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require certain municipalities to license residential contractors. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 9-34-12 be amended to read as follows: 9-34-12. A municipality may license, tax, and regulate plumbers, electricians, electrical workers, residential contractors , and heating, ventilation, and air conditioning contractors. However, a first class municipality shall license residential contractors. The residential contractor provisions of this section do not apply to dealers of manufactured or mobile homes as defined in chapter 32-7A. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
